item.title: Making a new Website
item.description: For a long time this website has had a couple of links to contact me, but those days are over. Now I have a brand new Hugo website with a custom written theme complete with A homepage with more social links, and description of my skills An about page with description of who I am A blog Why Hugo? The first question is why a site builder? I’m competent at web development, why not just write it all myself?
